'Potassium bitartrate', also known as 'potassium hydrogen tartrate', has formula
KC 4H 5O 6, is a byproduct of winemaking. In
cooking it is known as 'cream of tartar'. It is the potassium acid salt of
tartaric acid, a carboxylic acid.
